1,1,,good,Proactive regulatory framework before major AI adoption problems
2,1,,good,Clear legal framework for financial institutions to follow
3,1,,good,Emphasis on transparency and customer rights
4,1,,mixed,Implementation varies across institutions; compliance monitoring ongoing
5,2,,good,Comprehensive mapping of government AI use published
6,2,,good,Human oversight maintained for all significant decisions (no purely automated negative decisions)

8,2,,mixed,Varied implementation quality across agencies
9,2,,good,Identified opportunities for cross-government collaboration
10,3,,good,2.5-3 million taxpayers required to do little or nothing for tax returns

13,3,,good,Preserved human oversight option

15,4,,good,Maintained human final decision-making
16,4,,good,Structured governance for algorithm updates
17,4,,good,Faster processing for low-risk applications
18,4,,mixed,Risk factors may reflect historical biases (requires ongoing monitoring)
19,5,,good,Faster processing for simple claims
20,5,,good,Human oversight preserved for complex cases
